blocks-questions--default.title: Questions and answers
blocks-questions--default.text: Yandex Cloud is a public cloud platform that provides corporations, medium businesses, and individual developers with a scalable infrastructure.
blocks-questions--default.additionalInfo: Yandex Cloud was launched in 2018 and has doubled in size since then.

items.title: What data sources does DataLens support? 0
What is data materialization and is it required to use it? 1
items.text: Materialization is exporting data from the source to integrated DataLens storage. Materialization is optional when working with databases. All CSV files are automatically materialized. All CSV files are automatically materialized.
